publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1598 Nicola Sturgeon: The Draft Mental Health (Cross-border Visits) (Scotland) Regulations 2008—That the Health and Sport Committee recommends that the draft Mental Health (Cross-border Visits) (Scotland) Regulations 2008 be approved. Supported by: Shona Robison*, Stewart Maxwell*

S3M-1598 Nicola Sturgeon: The Draft Mental Health (Cross-border Visits) (Scotland) Regulations 2008—That the Health and Sport Committee recommends that the draft Mental Health (Cross-border Visits) (Scotland) Regulations 2008 be approved. Supported by: Shona Robison, Stewart Maxwell
